SELECT /* etpinfo.getJisuListByEtpRepresent 시장을 대표하는 지수정보를 조회한다. */
base.f16013 AS f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , base.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ , base.f16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */ , base.market_id AS market_id /* 시장 ID */
, FORMAT( base.f15001, '###,###,###,###,###,###' ) AS f15001 /* 현재가 */ , FORMAT( base.f15472, '###,###,###,###,###,###' ) AS f15472 /* 대비 */ , CASE WHEN base.f15004 > 0 THEN CONCAT( '+', CAST( base.f15004 AS CHAR ) ) ELSE CAST( base.f15004 AS CHAR ) END AS f15004 /* 등락율 */
FROM ( SELECT td_index_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.f16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */ , td_index_basic.market_id AS market_id /* 시장 ID */ , td_index_basic.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */
, td_index_basic.f15001 AS f15001 /* 현재가 */ , td_index_basic.f15472 AS f15472 /* 대비 */ , td_index_basic.f15004 AS f15004 /* 등락율 */
FROM td_index_basic WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( td_index_basic.f16013 , td_index_basic.large_type , td_index_basic.middle_type ) IN ( SELECT tm_code_dtl.com_val01 , tm_code_dtl.com_val02 , tm_code_dtl.com_val03
FROM tm_code_dtl WHERE tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd = 'COM003' /* 시장을 대표하는 지수 */ AND tm_code_dtl.use_yn = '1' )
) base

SELECT /* etpinfo.getJisuListByEtpRepresentCnt 시장을 대표하는 지수의 ETF, ETN 건수를 조회한다. */
base.f16257 AS f16257 /* ETP기초지수코드 */ , base.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */
, FORMAT( IFNULL( MAX( CASE WHEN base.gubun = 'ETF' THEN base.grp_cnt END ) , 0 ) , '###,###,###,###,###,###' ) AS grp_etf_cnt /* ETF 건수 */
, FORMAT( IFNULL( MAX( CASE WHEN base.gubun = 'ETF' THEN base.grp_sum END ) , 0 ) , '###,###,###,###,###,###' ) AS grp_etf_sum /* ETF SUM( 시가총액 ) */
, FORMAT( IFNULL( MAX( CASE WHEN base.gubun = 'ETN' THEN base.grp_cnt END ) , 0 ) , '###,###,###,###,###,###' ) AS grp_etn_cnt /* ETN 건수 */ , FORMAT( IFNULL( MAX( CASE WHEN base.gubun = 'ETN' THEN base.grp_sum END ) , 0 ) , '###,###,###,###,###,###' ) AS grp_etn_sum /* ETN SUM( 시가총액 ) */
FROM ( SELECT td_etp_basic.f16257 AS f16257 /* ETP기초지수코드 */ , base.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ , CASE WHEN td_etp_basic.f16493 IN ( '1', '2' ) /* ETP상품구분코드(1:ETF(투자회사형),2:ETF(수익증권형),3:ETN,4:손실제한형ETN) */ THEN 'ETF' ELSE 'ETN' END AS gubun , COUNT(*) AS grp_cnt , SUM( td_etp_basic.f15028 ) AS grp_sum /* SUM( 시가총액 ) */
FROM td_etp_basic , ( SELECT td_index_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ FROM td_index_basic WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( td_index_basic.f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.large_type /* 지수대분류(FNGUIDE, KRX, KIS, KAP) */ , td_index_basic.middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ ) IN ( SELECT tm_code_dtl.com_val01 , tm_code_dtl.com_val02 , tm_code_dtl.com_val03
FROM tm_code_dtl WHERE tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd = 'COM003' /* 시장을 대표하는 지수 */ AND tm_code_dtl.use_yn = '1' ) ) base
WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_etp_basic.f16257 = base.f16013 /* ETP기초지수코드 */ AND base.middle_type = CASE WHEN td_etp_basic.f34239 = '2' /* ETP기초지수MID */ THEN 'KSP'
WHEN td_etp_basic.f34239 = '4' /* ETP기초지수MID */ THEN 'KSQ' END
GROUP BY td_etp_basic.f16257 , base.middle_type , CASE WHEN td_etp_basic.f16493 IN ( '1', '2' ) /* ETP상품구분코드(1:ETF(투자회사형),2:ETF(수익증권형),3:ETN,4:손실제한형ETN) */ THEN 'ETF' ELSE 'ETN' END ) base
GROUP BY base.f16257 , base.middle_type

FROM tm_etpctg_code WHERE tm_etpctg_code.ctg_large_code = #{ctg_large_code} /* ETP대분류코드 */ AND tm_etpctg_code.ctg_code = #{ctg_code} /* ETP분류코드 */ ) ) tm_etpctg_map
ON td_etp_basic.F16012 = tm_etpctg_map.F16012
ORDER BY tm_etpctg_map.ctg_code , tm_etpctg_map.F16012
